author: jankeesvanandel
msg: Initial MYFACES-2140 commit (class structure and simple annotation handling implementation using XBean)

author: covener
msg: It's not safe to ask an SDK that doesn't define LDAP_DEFAULT_LIMIT to
use -1, because it might put it on the wire as an unsigned int.
We previously special-cased this for the MSSDK, but it needs to be more general.
